title: Look up at the Starry Sky
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>What an incredible starry sky<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>There isn’t anything blocking or anything bright around here so, this is the best place for stargazing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Do you come here often?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Sometimes, with Dia and Mari…. Alright, Nozomi-chan, take a look<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Wow…. Uwaah~! Amazing…. It looks so bright!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, pretty surprising, isn’t it? You’re looking around Cygnus right now<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>….So that means, hmm…. That one is Delphinus?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Delphinus is diagonally below Cygnus. Do you like Delphinus, Nozomi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s not really like that, it’s because it fits your image, Kanan-chan. It’s so free and flexible…. Right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eeh!? W-, what are you saying, geez~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
